name: .LAYOUTDESIGNER File Extension
summary: Learn about .LAYOUTDESIGNER files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by QuickBooks, a financial management application; contains a customized template of an invoice, sales receipt, estimate, credit memo, statement, or purchase order that can be used with another QuickBooks company file; created by the Layout Designer tool in QuickBooks.

content: Open Layout Designer. At the top of the form choose an existing template, select New Template... or Edit Current Template....
Customize your template. You can choose what types of information show up on the form and you can format the template by adding a logo, changing fonts, adding a background image, etc.
Once you're done editing the template, select File â†’ Export, then choose the format you want to export the template to: .TIFF, .PDF, or the LAYOUTDESIGNER file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
